1355551.title: Magic School bus

choices: William and the Port-A-Shrinker in reverse
William intentionally enlarged thanks 2 the school bus
William and the science lab incident
13555512.content:
You chose


William Li - toddler
Wanda’s baby brother
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x6ty27...

https://www.thewatchcartoononline.tv/the...

And specifically for little William Li to become
William Large.

Now the question is the circumstances of
How William gets BIG and to start the story
13555512.title: William Li becomes William Large

choices: Growing up - clothes grow too - reader version
Growing up - outgrowing clothes and more
135555121.content:
William Li - toddler
Wanda’s baby brother
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x6ty27...

https://www.thewatchcartoononline.tv/the...

———-

This is more a retelling or alternative version
of the storyline from the episode.


William had just shrunken Miss Frizzle’s class
with the “Port-A-Shrinker” thinking it was a toy
then fired a shot that went out the window and
shrank the school bus too.


He then dropped the device temporarily distracted
by something else.
The distraction didn’t last long and he started
walking towards the shrunken class.

“Izzle! Anda!”

As he walked towards them he stepped
on that “Port-A-Shrinker” breaking it.

“Uh oh” he said.

Suddenly with his foot still on the broken
damaged device it started to spark then
zapped him with a different color beam
than normal.

The odd colored energy surrounded and
spread all over his body.

“HeeHee ickle weird” he laughed unaware of
the seriousness of what happened.

The energy and glow soon faded.
Oddly William seemed unaffected.


“Huh well that doesn’t seem right” noted
Mizz Frizzle.


Next William started walking away.

Frizz called Liz
“Liz while we work on getting back to
the bus and unshrunk you’re in charge and
gonna have to take care of William”

Liz looked nervous but obeyed


——
A/N ok now I’m going to let the reader/writers
choose if Williams clothes grow with him or not
as well as other factors
135555121.title: William and the Port-A-Shrinker in reverse

1355551211.content:
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...
——

Liz looked nervous but obeyed and followed
after William.


Suddenly Liz noticed William glow.
Then he grew clothes and all 6 inches taller
and larger keeping the same proportions
all over.


“HeeHee ickle feel gud”

Liz got nervous and ran panicked to try and
tell the class what happened.
The class was now in the bathroom looking
for things to help them get out of the house in
their shrunken state.

Liz was about to warn them when the now
taller William pushed the bathroom door shut
having followed Liz.


“HeeHee Wiz Pway fun” said
William picking up the distraught lizard.

William walked back to the living room with
Liz and the class had to change their plans.

Some time later William’s mom came to
check on him.
She didn’t see Wanda or the class that had
offered to help but William seemed ok.

Then she got another work call.
She was swamped with work and calls.


As she was about to answer another
call she paused.

’Did William seem... taller?’
she mused to herself but didn’t look back
assuming it to be her imagination from
work stress.

As she walked away she didn’t notice
Willam glow again but the distraught Liz did.

This time Willam gained another 14 inches
in height.

“HeeHee ickle funny feel gud”

This time after growing William was getting
thirsty.

“Firsty wan ink”

Liz understood someone and rushed him a
baby bottle.

“Yay wiz ing dwink”
Then as William began to drink much to
Liz’s dismay William glowed again.

This time William added another 2 feet in
height and size becoming as tall as his
mother but he was too busy drinking to
notice the tickle this time.


Liz was freakin out then things got worse.
With William’s increased size that meant a
few things.

# 1 he drank his bottle faster due to being
larger while the bottle hadn’t changed size.

# 2 being bigger apparently meant a bigger
thirst.

He soon finished the bottle and was still
thirsty.

# 3 Like his thirst his hunger increased too
as evident by the stomach growl

“Dwink gun me still firsty an hungy”

William however was too impatient for
help. He wobbly walked to the kitchen
and didn’t understand why or what was
happening but as Liz gave chase
William noticed he could reach some things
now.


William opened the fridge and began
raiding it.
He pulled out 3 apple juice boxes and
made quick work of them.

Next he pulled out a jug of chocolate
milk and downed that.

Suddenly William glowed again as a
helpless Liz looked on.

His growth spurts seemed to be getting
bigger but still spaced around 15 to 35 minutes
apart at random.

This time William swelled 4 feet taller now
topping out around 10 feet tall.

Again William was too distracted.
His thirst again persisted as did his hunger.


Next William chugged a gallon of OJ
then cranberry juice.
Next William found a couple baby bottles
of milk and a couple of baby formula and
finished those off.

Lastly he had 2 bottles of water.

His thirst quenched next was food!
He ate an entire 6 pack of chocolate pudding!


He ate 2 jars of Apple sauce, a container
of cottage cheese, half a chocolate cake,
2 things of baby food, a slice of pie, and
a couple of brownies.

Satisfied William was now back to his
curious self and felt the urge to explore.


He walked out of the kitchen and then
explored the house a bit a distraught Liz
giving chase. Soon he’s bored though
and spots the door to the backyard.


Now that he can reach it he opens it
and goes outside much to more displeasure
for Liz.

Fortunately it was a darn good thing
that he had gone outside lest his
mom notice something was up but also
because again Liz watched as within
mere moments of entering the backyard
William glowed again.


Liz facepalmed as William swelled clothes
and all to 18 feet tall.

“HeeHee big ickle feel gud” he giggled
as this time the feeling was stronger and
lasted longer.

Fortunately the 3 1/2 floor house was still
larger than William.


William then sat down and began to
play with one of his mothers meditation
yoga ball things which now to William wasn’t
quite as big anymore.

Liz relaxed just a bit.

Meanwhile Wanda and the class had just
reached a window in the house but had
to devise a way to get it open.
1355551211.title: Growing Up - reserved - clothed version

choices: A wandering big Willy - Part 2- reserved-
13555512111.content:
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

——-

William had played with the ball for quite
some time and Liz was beginning to
relax hoping things had calmed down.


Alas Liz had jinxed it!
William began to glow again then as
the glow faded he swelled larger.

Bigger and bigger William grew this time
swelling to 35 feet tall.
Liz was slightly concerned cause
the tall tot was barefooted but then shook
his/her head realizing there’s more important
things to worry about.


Willam stood up and finally noticed slightly
things were different only being so young
not in the correct way even though he was
literally only slight shorter than his house.


“Ooo tings oook whiddle lots twoys”

Liz began to panic! William thought this was
playtime or a game and things toys?
What’s worse is his growing spurts
weren’t stopping.


Willam looked around.
Liz hopes up and down trying to mime
instructions to stay put.
At first it worked as William watched the tiny
dancing lizard and sucked his thumb a bit.


However the interest didn’t last long.
Willam turned around and walked wobbly
to the backyard fence leaving slightly large
footprints in the yard.

He then lifted one leg over the fence then
the other. Now in a neighbors yard.
Liz panicked and with difficulties followed after.


Willam then walked thru said neighbors yard
then went over yet another fence.
Then walked thru a 3rd yard and over a 3rd
fence.


In the 4th yard he stopped.
Fortunately things were shockingly quiet
and deserted so he was unseen not that
he was concerned.

William was thirsty again.

“Firsty wan dwink”

Then he spotted a small kiddie pool with water.
To him it was like a bowl.


He walked over to it and picked it up.


Meanwhile at Wanda’s house the shrunken
class had just gotten the bathroom window
open enough to get out of but now had to
get down, go thru the yard and get to the bus.


Inside Wanda and William’s mom had just
finished another 2 back to back calls while
working hard from home.
She came to check on William only to see
him gone.

“Huh I guess Wanda and her friends took
Willam out for a bit! That’s a relief”

Just then her phones were ringing again
and thus she remained blissfully unaware of
her growing boy.



Back with William, Liz had nearly caught up.
William was slurping down the water from
the kiddy pool he had found.


William had just finished the water in the
pool when Liz had gotten over the fence.
William then dropped the pool and was ready
to move on.


He crossed the rest of the yard and climbed
over yet another fence.

Now William was on the outskirts of a
wooded area. Liz was actually happy that
William wasn’t headed towards a populated
area at present.


William stepped forward with curiosity.
the woods looked large even to him.
In truth it was some large woods.
Also most trees towered over him.
They ranged from a few feet taller to
2, 3, 4 or even 5x his current size.


As Willam entered the woods down a path
he stopped

“Ooo lotsa Twees”

Soon Liz was following Williams footprints!
William disappeared to the world saving any
mass hysteria for now.



A couple minutes of walking and William
stopped again feeling strange.
Once more the brief glow returned and faded.
William started to grow again.


Bigger and bigger William swelled!
Taller and taller!
The tree tops got closer.

A couple minutes and William had stopped
growing at 70 feet tall, twice his previous size.


“HeeHee unny ickle back feel gud”

William stood there for a few minutes looking
around.
13555512111.title: A wandering big Willy- reserved-

choices: William Large is at large - reserved-
135555121111.content:
William Li - toddler
Wanda’s baby brother
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x6ty27...

https://www.thewatchcartoononline.tv/the...

———-

https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

——

William stood there for a few minutes looking
around.

The ground felt cool to the barefoot 70
foot tall tot.
Suddenly William had to pee.
He looked around

“Potty!”

Unfortunately there was none.
Taking a lead from a male babysitter he
had a few times William pulled down his
shorts then his training diaper
and then watered the woods or a least
a few of the nearest trees.


He took a couple minutes then finished
up and pulled back up his garments.


Now he was thirsty again but oddly not hungry
or even sleepy not that it registered to
his young mind.

“Firsty wan dwink”

William then remembered there was a small lake
through these woods.


William resumes his walk for the 1st time
since growing 70 feet tall.
Fortunately the soft ground muffled his steps
quite a bit but even so every bare foot fall
made a thump.


His footprints were even bigger now.
The ground and trees even shook a bit
with each step.


William took things slow.
Not only was this his 1st time being in
these woods alone but he didn’t exactly
remember the way.

Plus he wasn’t sure why but things looked
different to him now but not like before
the woods. He didn’t grasp it was a difference
in relative perspectives where 15 minutes or
so ago some things looked “small”

Here many things stood bigger than him.



Slowly he lumbered through the forest.
Finally he reached the lake shore.
On one side where he was was the woods,
On the other ironically was an actual
forest bigger than the woods and
past those woods unknown to William or
Liz was another town larger than their own.


Liz was still a bit behind William tailing him!

Willam stood looking at the lake.


Back with Wanda and the class they realized the
bus was missing but had found it.
They were now back to normal size.
They head into the house to find William and
Liz missing.


“Oh no where is William?
Mom is gonna kill me”

“Relax Wanda maybe Liz took him out back”
said Ralph.


They head out back to see an empty yard
but some concerning evidence.



“Oh no please don’t tell me that what I
think happened did happen” said Wanda.


“Well look at it this way Wanda
looks like now William is your BIG Brother”
joked Ralph.


To which I’m classic fashion many groaned
“RALPHIE”


“Hmm I thought that the “Port-A-Shrinker”
was acting weirder than ever when William
stepped on it”


“Miss Frizzle this is serious! I know you
always tell us take chances, make mistakes
and get messy but this mess might be way too
big to handle”


“Hmm I see your dilemma!
Unfortunately I dunno if I can fix the
“Port-A-Shrinker” or if it’ll be effective enough!
I do however have an idea using the bus.
The rest of you will need to find William”


With that Mizz Frizzle left with the bus in a rush.
The class followed the trail presumably left
by William.

Arnold grumbled about how he shoulda
stayed home today!



Back at the lake Willam bent down and began
to drink the lake water.
A good 5 minutes later of gulping down water
and noticeably lower water levels ,
William’s thirst was quenched again.


Curious about the next bunch of trees and beyond
William walks around the lake and enters
the thicker slightly darker and larger forest.


The soil in the forest pretty much resembled
the smaller woods.
The trees did too tho a few were larger than
in the woods.
Practically all the trees here were between
80 and 200 feet tall.
Still Willam at 70 feet tall for now proceeded
into the denser larger forest.




Like with the smaller wood each step the
giant William took left an audible thump
, a large footprint about 10 inches deep and
causes the plus trees to shake a little.


As Liz gave chase and the class behind.
The class was shocked how much had actually
happened today and it wasn’t even 11am yet.
Then again they had just gotten to Wanda’s
Around 7am.



Slowly William wandered through the forest.
About 1/3 or the way in William had stopped.
Liz noticed it had been a while since
William last grew but knew better than to
get excited too soon.


In truth what neither Liz, the class or anyone
noticed is now at the point his growth
spurts were getting bigger because he was
doubling in size his growth spurts were slowly
getting further apart.


Now however as William stood stopped
a familiar brief glow then feelings struck.
William again started to grow again.
Perhaps the shift in time between spurts
was also in part because his bigger spurts
took longer to complete.


4 minutes and 1 growth spurt later
Willam was now 150 feet tall.
At last he was taller than a good portion of
trees in the forest yet still they hid him
well enough.


This new change would be short lived as
once again William had to pee.
Like before he’d go along the trees but
this time the pressure actually did some
damage to the ground and some trees
and the volume created a mini pond.



William didn’t notice and finished his business.
Moving on Willam resumes his walk and
exploration.
This time even with the soft ground
Willam’s steps were leaving way louder
thuds bordering on needing another word
to describe them.


The ground trembled more than ever as
did the trees.
His larger footprints were now 4 feet deep
in the soft soil.



Back in the woods the class came across
Willam’s 1st stop.


“Phew that pee smells strong!
What does your family feed William!”
commented Ralph and Carlosx
135555121111.title: A wandering big Willy - Part 2- reserved-

1355551214.content:
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...
—-
A/N - I decided to do an unclothed take on this
too
——-

Liz looked nervous but obeyed and followed
after William.


Suddenly Liz noticed William glow.
Then he grew clothes and all 6 inches taller
and larger keeping the same proportions
all over.


“HeeHee ickle feel gud”

Liz got nervous and ran panicked to try and
tell the class what happened.
The class was now in the bathroom looking
for things to help them get out of the house in
their shrunken state.


Unfortunately the class couldn’t understand
Liz’s panicked miming.
Liz rushed back to Willam in time to see
him spill something on himself.


Then Liz noticed Willam glow and
swell in size this time by a foot taller.
Liz noticed Willam’s clothes looked tighter.


Just then his mom came in having finished
a series of calls.
It was only 730 AM but immediately his mother
noticed the mess.

“Oh my William you need cleaned up!
Come on Liz I dunno where Wanda stepped
off to but we need to give my little boy a
bath.”


Liz tried miming to her but mother’s concern
was taking priority.
She picked him up somehow oblivious to his
changes and took him to the bathroom.


The class heard them coming and hid.
William’s mom began to unclothe him and
start the bath water.

“Huh that’s odd? Your clothes seem small!
Oh my we might need to buy you some new
zones soon. Kids these days you all sure
do grow up fast”


Liz facepalmed!

“Mommy’s little boy is gonna be mommy’s
big boy before I know it huh?
Just don’t grow up too fast on me now.
Your big sister Wanda has already done that”


William giggled
“HeeHee IG OY IG OY”

His mom finally got his clothes off.

“Yes that’s right my little Will is gonna
be a big strong boy before I know it”


“IG OY IG OY”

Then her phones started ringing like crazy
again. She stopped the running tub and
sat William in the water.


“Liz I’m gonna need you to watch
William and hopefully Wanda will take
over soon”


With that she left.

The class came out and Liz rushed to them.

“Oh great now we gotta watch William while
we’re small” said Ralphie.


Fortunately William was enjoying his time
in the tub for awhile so there didn’t seem to
be much to do for them at least not until the
class saw what Liz had tried tellin them.


William felt strange and began to glow.
The class noticed.

“Hey look William is.. Glowing” said
Dorothy Ann.

Liz looked distraught and mined her panic.
The glow faded after about 30 seconds but
the class was shocked.


Willam began growing larger again.
This time he swelled to the height of the
siblings mother then stopped.


“Oh no Willam is growing” panicked Wanda


“Well your mom did say he was gonna grow
big but I guess this was faster than expected”
said Ralphie


“Gives new meanin to the phrase growing
boy huh” joked Carlos.


“This is serious” said Wanda.

“But how” asked Phoebe


“Do you know Mizz Frizzle” asked D.A.


“I was afraid of this. It was the Port-A-Shrinker”
said Frizzle.


“But isn’t it supposed to -gulp- ya know only
shrink and grow to normal” asked Arnold



“Normally yes but when Willam damage it
whatever he did must’ve temporarily shorted
it out or something and made into a
Port-A-Grower instead” reasoned Phoebe.



“Correct-A-Mundo” said Frizzle


“Oh my at my old school little brothers and
sisters weren’t suddenly grown big”


Soon the 5 1/2 foot toddler noticed the class
and his sister.

“Izzle, Anda whiddle! Me IG OY”


“Uh oh” said Arnold.


“No Willam we need to get us normal
and shrink you back”

The mischievous yet happy tyke didn't
agree but that’s also because he didn’t
truly grasp the situation as he stood up!

“NO INK ME IG OY”

William got out of the bath taking full advantage
of his new height.
He left the bathroom in his birthday suit
without a care.


“Uh oh I don’t think William likes that plan
and we’re too small to stop him” said Ralph.


“I knew I should’ve stayed home today”
said Arnold.


Shockingly William went to the kitchen and
grabbed a bag which he filled with a good
amount of food and drinks from the fridge.


As the shrunken class gave chase.
They got to the kitchen in time to see
Willam go out the backyard door.


As he stepped out still in the buff they
noticed him glow then grow again
this time to 10 feet tall.

It was then that he actually felt hungry
and thirsty.

“Hungwy and firsty”

He sat down with his raided goods from the
kitchen fridge and ate and drank.

He pulled out 4 apple juice boxes and
made quick work of them.

Next he pulled out a jug of chocolate
milk and downed that.


Next William chugged a gallon of OJ
then cranberry juice.
Next William found a couple baby bottles
of milk and a couple of baby formula and
finished those off.

Lastly he had 2 bottles of water.

His thirst quenched next was food!
He ate an entire 6 pack of chocolate pudding!


He ate 2 jars of Apple sauce, a container
of cottage cheese, half a chocolate cake,
2 things of baby food, a slice of pie, and
a couple of brownies.

Satisfied William was now back to his
curious self and felt the urge to explore.

info.brief_description: A girl or someone of your choosing finds or comes into contact with a size change device!
info.description:
Based off of a similarly named interactive
( Mysterious Shrink Ray )


You, a character you choose or create
Find a size change device or come in
contact with one and Hijinks ensue!


Rules / Guidelines / Guidance

1 - NO MALE GIANTS
( exceptions permitted in case by case basis )
( permitted example might include a giant baby )

2 - Shrinking males, shrinking girls or growing
girls ( Giantess / GTS ) strongly preferred!

3 - Decent grammar/English please!

4 - character age ranges preferred are
ages 2 to 18

5 - Limit nudity/sex etc to a bare minimum

6 - no scat

7 - limit vore

8 - I reserve the right to add / edit / remove
chapters or rules

9 - have fun and most anything goes
